citation.article-title: Revision of the genus Massilia La Scola et al. 2000, with an emended description of the genus and inclusion of all species of the genus Naxibacter as new combinations, and proposal of Massilia consociata sp. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Massilia alkalitolerans comb. nov.

Massilia alkalitolerans (al.ka.li.to′le.rans. Arabic article al the; Arabic n. qaliy ashes of saltwort; French n. alcali alkali; N.L. n. alkali alkali; L. part. adj. tolerans tolerating; N.L. part. adj. alkalitolerans alkali-tolerating).
Basonym: Naxibacter alkalitolerans Xu et al. 2005.
The description is identical to that given by Xu et al. (2005) with the emendment of Kämpfer et al. (2008).
The type strain is YIM 31775T ( = CCTCC AA 204003T = KCTC 12194T).
